en: Learn how to move the ROV. Using the thumbsticks, move around the pool and guide the ROV through the red circles.
Learn how to change speeds on the ROV. Using the D-Pad(Up and Down), increase and decrease the movement power of the ROV.
Learn how to use the lights on the ROV. Using the D-Pad(Left and Right), Change the brightness of the ROV lights and find the 3 hidden objects.
Learn how to use the gripper tool. Using the Triggers, use the gripper tool to pickup and deposit the 3 objects into the net.
Learn how to use the vacuum cleaner. Search the pool for the small red balls and vacuum them up.
Learn how to use the cutter tool. Using the triggers, cut the 4 red net sections.
Learn how to use the magnet and grappling hook. Use the gripper tool to connect the hook to the fence, then connect the magnet to the scooter.
fr: Apprenez à remonter des objets à l'aide d'un aimant et d'un grappin
